Hospital.Controllers
Class TreatmentResultController

java.lang.Object
  Hospital.Controllers.TreatmentResultController

@SystemAPI
public class TreatmentResultController
extends java.lang.Object

This controller adds the function to enter treatment-results to the main public API

TreatmentResultController

@SystemAPI
public TreatmentResultController(WorldController wc,
                                           NurseController nc)
This constructs this controller with a given WorldController and NurseController.

Parameters:
wc - the world in which this controller works
nc - the nurse using this controller
Throws:
ArgumentIsNullException - wc or nc was null
Method Detail

getOpenTreatments

@SystemAPI
public TreatmentInfo[] getOpenTreatments()
Returns an array of all treatments without result.

Returns:
an array of TreatmentInfos containing treatments without result
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - the nurse is not logged in

getArguments

@SystemAPI
public ArgumentList getArguments(TreatmentInfo m)
Returns the arguments needed to enter the treatment result

Parameters:
m - The treatmentInfo associated with the treatment to enter the result of.
Returns:
The arguments to be answered first
Throws:
IllegalInfo - if the treatment was not found in the world

enterResult

@SystemAPI
public java.lang.String enterResult(TreatmentInfo m,
                                              ArgumentList args)
Enters the result in the system with the given arguments.

Parameters:
m - The treatmentInfo associated with the treatment to enter the results of.
args - The arguments needed to enter the treatment.
Returns:
A resultString of the entered treatmentResult.
Throws:
IllegalInfo - If the associated treatment was not found.
InvalidArgumentException - If the given ArgumentList was null, of the wrong length, not answered or if the answer did not satisfy the constraints.
NotLoggedInException - If the nurse was logged out.
